attributes.action: Make MPs accountable for their actions in the Commons
attributes.additional_details:
The article highlighting the recent issue:
http://www.thenational.scot/comment/15058497.Kirsty_Strickland__A_male_MP_woofed_at_Tasmina_Ahmed_Sheikh_____guess_how_the_Westminster_old_boys__club_responded_/?ref=fbshr

Link showing employment law around harassment:
https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/work/discrimination-at-work/what-are-the-different-types-of-discrimination/harassment-at-work/
attributes.background:
When a male MP woofed at MP Tasmina Ahmed-Sheikh in the House of Commons, it highlighted the despicable behaviour all so prevalent. Sexism, harassment, and behaviour that would be embarrassing within a school classroom.
It is time that the behaviour in the Commons was examined and enforced.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like MPs to be held accountable for their conduct in the House of Commons Chamber.
